## Source: ossf-package-analysis (506c813d15e45d42e15685b1beab91ac54a392a1769349514ea954d66b656ca1)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'formvalidationtestauth' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
